mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS id, USER_NAME AS strUserName, USER_EMAIL AS strEmail, USER_ROLE AS strRole, USER_PHONE AS strPhoneNumber FROM USER WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_EMAIL = #{strEmail}
SELECT USER_PW AS strPassword FROM USER WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_EMAIL = #{strEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PW, USER_ROLE, USER_PHONE ) VALUES ( 0, #{strUserName}, #{strEmail}, #{strPassword}, #{strRole}, #{strPhoneNumber} )
